comments:
I work on an IBM product (RSA) and we're seeing the following problem when we
try to open a browser on linux RH Enterprise 3 WS (Work station). 

Hoping you all have seen this before or can give some ideas of what we might be
able to do to work around this. 

in the console window I see

>>Unhandled event loop exception
>>Reason:
>>No more handles [NS_InitEmbedding /usr/lib/mozilla-1.4:/usr/lib/mozilla-1.4
>>erro r -2147221164]

in the .log file in the workspace I see:

Request that stack trace be reduced to show only swt portion (since this is IBM 
product), I can't figure out a way to edit the description so requesting that 
this be done.
I'm closing this bug per request of manager and will report to newsgroups.
